channel.title: ASF Jira
channel.description: This file is an XML representation of an issue

item.title: [HIVE-7123] Follow-up of HIVE-6367
item.description:
HIVE-6367 provides initial decimal support in Parquet serde. The are a few minor items left over:

1. parquet_decimal.q seems failing
2. will use fixed length binary to encode decimal instead of variable length binary.

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are not closed can be reopened.

ATTACHMENT ID: 12646789
The above test failures are unrelated. Patch is ready for review. brocknoland Would you mind doing so?
Patch #2 slightly changed the way that the number of bytes needed to hold a decimal value of a given precision.
LGTM. The only item is that precisionToBytes is a constant and thus should be final and all caps.
